info.document:
Nollywood actor, Emeka Ike, has been named the Nollywood Living Legend in the Nollywood Europe Golden Awards (NEGA 2017).

The awardee also said he dedicates the award to all loving men and women who died in the hands of their spouses.

The Nigerian actor took to his Instagram page to share the photo of the award.

He wrote, "Baba GOD, today i'm celebrated a golden living legend. How could this be without you perfecting me? I return all the glory to you and dedicate this award to all the loving men and women, who died in the hands of their beloved spouses, people they loved not knowing their wicked intents.

"May u find eternal rest... amen... OPE o , ORI YOMI"

Emeka Ike had, in an interview, told The PUNCH that there have been about two attempts to kill him after his divorce and claimed that it was those people who are after his life that leaked the news of his divorce to the media.
